overview: David Bell is currently an Operating Advisor with Pegasus Capital Advisors, L.P. and a Senior Advisor to AOL and AOL Ventures. He previously served as Chairman and CEO of one of the world’s largest marketing communications service companies, The Interpublic Group, Inc. Prior to that, Bell was Chairman and CEO of True North Communications Inc., the world’s sixth largest global advertising and marketing communications holding company. Under Bell’s leadership as President and CEO of Bozell Worldwide, he grew the company from $12 million in revenue to over $500 million. Mr. Bell is also a Director of The Warnaco Group, Inc. and Lighting Science Group Corporation.
